document.docAuthor: Tian, He, Gu, Jun-Jie, Yin, Xiang Chu & Ren, Dong
document.docTitle: Parelcana pulchmacula Tian, Gu, Yin & Ren, 2019, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: The first Elcanidae (Orthoptera, Elcanoidea) from the Daohugou fossil bed of northeastern China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The first Elcanidae (Orthoptera, Elcanoidea) from the Daohugou fossil bed of northeastern China

figureCitation.captionText: Figure 2. Photo and line drawing of Parelcana pulchmacula sp. nov. A, B holotype, CNU-ORT-NN 2016041 C, D CNU-ORT-NN 2016035 E, F CNU-ORT-NN 2016042 G, H CNU-ORT-NN 2016036. The inclined and dotted lines in the middle of the wings of D and F represent the cracks in the specimen. The dotted line on the wing venation represents the imaginary line of the wing. Scale bar: 2 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph: ScP with 6-8 branches ending in anterior margin; CuA very short and fusion with CuPaα before ScA ends in anterior margin, CuA+CuPaα long and S-shaped; occurrence of two big and round dark spots in distal half of wing and one small spot covering the area of CuPa.
From the latin 'Pulch-' for beautiful and 'macula' for patches, referring to the beautiful spots and coloration of the forewing.
Holotype , CNU-ORT-NN2016041; Paratypes , CNU-ORT-NN2016035; CNU-ORT-NN2016036; CNU-ORT-NN2016042.
Daohugou Village, Shantou Township, Ningcheng County, Inner Mongolia, China; Jiulongshan Formation, Middle Jurassic.

caption.paragraph:
Figure 2. Photo and line drawing of
Parelcana pulchmacula
sp. nov. A, B holotype, CNU-ORT-NN2016041 C, D CNU-ORT-NN2016035 E, F CNU-ORT-NN2016042 G, H CNU-ORT-NN2016036. The inclined and dotted lines in the middle of the wings of D and F represent the cracks in the specimen. The dotted line on the wing venation represents the imaginary line of the wing. Scale bar: 2 mm.
